name: Little Odyssey (Game for LD45)
description:
This game is inspired from a rock song called Little Odyssey (細美 武士, the HIATUS). My title ane text in game are referenced from the lyrics of this song. Actually I would like to have this song as the bgm but this is a compo so I can only improvise my own bgm.

Instruction are inclued in game:

W -> Forward S -> Slow Down A, D -> Adjust Direction

There are few instruction/direction in game, which is kind of bad because i have no time to do this (got homework and midterm tomorrow and I had to review and finish assignment in these 2 days). Anyway enjoy the space.
